plant.description: Fast-growing climbing vines with trumpet-shaped flowers. Seeds contain lysergic acid amides.

toxins.name: Lysergic acid amides
toxins.description: Causes gastrointestinal upset and neurological signs.

treatments.name: Inducing Vomiting: A veterinarian may medically induce vomiting to remove the toxic substance from the cat's stomach2. Situation-specific note: You should never attempt to induce vomiting at home
Fluid Therapy: The veterinarian may administer fluid therapy to support the cat's system
Monitoring and Preventative Care: In some instances
